name: Asana
natural_language_description: 这是 Asana 节点。主要用于: Consume Asana REST API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: task
available_options: Project (值: project)
Subtask (值: subtask)
Task (值: task)
Task Comment (值: taskComment)
Task Project (值: taskProject)
Task Tag (值: taskTag)
User (值: user)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new project
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a project
Get (值: get) - Get a project
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many projects
Update (值: update) - Update a project
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent Task ID | 作用: The task to operate on | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the project to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the project to create | (必填项)

otherProperties.name: otherProperties
otherProperties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee (值: None) - Set Assignee on the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
assignee_status (值: None) - Set Assignee status on the task (requires Assignee)
completed (值: None) - Whether the task should be marked completed
due_on (值: None) - Date on which the time is due
name (值: None) - The new name of the task
liked (值: None) - Whether the task is liked by the authorized user
notes (值: None) - The task notes
projects (值: None) - The project to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: opt_fields (值: None) - Defines fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
opt_pretty (值: None) - Whether to provide “pretty” output

workspace.name: workspace
workspace.description: The workspace in which to get users. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
workspace.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace Name or ID | 作用: The workspace in which to get users. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the project to update the data of
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project ID | 作用: The ID of the project to update the data of | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Properties to search for | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee (值: None) - The assignee to filter tasks on. Note: If you specify assignee, you must also specify the workspace to filter on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
opt_fields (值: None) - Defines fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
opt_pretty (值: None) - Whether to provide “pretty” output
project (值: None) - The project to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
section (值: None) - The section to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
workspace (值: None) - The workspace to filter tasks on. Note: If you specify workspace, you must also specify the assignee to filter on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
completed_since (值: None) - Only return tasks that are either incomplete or that have been completed since this time
modified_since (值: None) - Only return tasks that have been modified since the given time

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Project to show the sections of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: Project to show the sections of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

section.name: section
section.description: The Section to move the task to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
section.natural_language_description: 参数名: Section Name or ID | 作用: The Section to move the task to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

searchTaskProperties.name: searchTaskProperties
searchTaskProperties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Properties to search for | 默认值: {}
available_options: completed (值: None) - Whether the task is marked completed
text (值: None) - Text to search for in name or notes

isTextHtml.name: isTextHtml
isTextHtml.description: Whether body is HTML or simple text
isTextHtml.natural_language_description: 参数名: Is Text HTML | 作用: Whether body is HTML or simple text | 默认值: False

text.name: text
text.description: Comment as HTML string. Do not use together with plain text.
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML Text | 作用: Comment as HTML string. Do not use together with plain text. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 作用: Other properties to set | 默认值: {}
available_options: archived (值: None) - Whether to only return projects whose archived field takes on the value of this parameter
team (值: None) - The new name of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

project.name: project
project.description: The project where the task will be removed from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
project.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: The project where the task will be removed from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

tag.name: tag
tag.description: The tag that should be added. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tag.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tags Name or ID | 作用: The tag that should be added. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: An identifier for the user to get data of. Can be one of an email address,the globally unique identifier for the user, or the keyword me to indicate the current user making the request.
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: An identifier for the user to get data of. Can be one of an email address,the globally unique identifier for the user, or the keyword me to indicate the current user making the request. | (必填项)

team.name: team
team.description: The team this project will be assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
team.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team Name or ID | 作用: The team this project will be assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 作用: Other properties to set | 默认值: {}
available_options: color (值: None) - Color of the project
due_on (值: None) - The day on which this project is due. This takes a date with format YYYY-MM-DD.
name (值: None) - The name of the project
notes (值: None) - Basic description or notes for the project
owner (值: None) - The new assignee/cardinal for this project
privacy_setting (值: None) - The privacy setting of the project
team (值: None) - The team this project will be assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
